Zone 1

Palm Beach County Administrator
Joseph Abruzzo is the County Administrator of Palm Beach County, where he oversees more than 7,100 positions and manages a $9 billion budget serving 1.6 million residents. He is dedicated to transparency in government, creating a positive workplace culture, and improving efficiency so residents experience the highest quality of service.
​
»​​
Joseph Abruzzo Biography

Note: block grid items should be the same size for optimal results Zone 8 ​ Animal Care & Control Clerk of Court Code Enforcement Consumer Affairs Contractor Certification / Licensing County Government Criminal Justice Commission District 1 Mayor Marino District 2 Commissioner Weiss District 3 Commissioner Flores District 4 Commissioner Woodward District 5 Commissioner Sachs District 6 Vice Mayor Baxter District 7 Commissioner Powell Jr. E-mail All Commissioners Zone 9 ​ Engineering Garbage Pickup Government Research (Library) Information Systems Services (Information Technology) Lot Clearing Parks Public Affairs Purchas​ing ​ Sheriff Supervisor of Elections Unlicensed Contractors Water Utilities Webmaster Zoning Violations Zone 10 ​ ​ Zone 11 Zone 12 Zone 13 Zone 14 Zone 15 Zone 16 Zone 17 Via Mail: Board of County Commissioners Palm Beach County 301 N. Olive Avenue West Palm Beach, FL 33401 Directions to the Robert Weisman Governmental Center ​ 301 N. Olive Avenue West Palm Beach, FL 33401 The Palm Beach County Robert Weisman Governmental Center is located in Downtown West Palm Beach. On I-95 head towards West Palm Beach Take exit 70 onto OKEECHOBEE BLVD east toward DOWNTOWN Go 1.7 miles to OLIVE AVENUE Turn Left on OLIVE AVENUE Go 0.7 miles and you will arrive at 301 N OLIVE AVENUE Get Directions with MapQuest Limited parking is available on the street, in nearby private lots, and in the County Parking Garages. These facilities charge for parking. Accessibility Assistance: For accessibility-related concerns please contact directly Public Affairs . 561-355-2754 We would be happy to assist in making your visits to our site as convenient as possible. Please CLICK HERE to review our Accessibility Statement page to review our Accessibility Statement. Page Content 2 Page Content 2 ​ E-mail Disclaimer: Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing. /tablet col 9 /row /container /#main Beginning Main Footer PBC Mission Statement To drive a continuous improvement culture of excellence that achieves a measurably high level of public satisfaction. Site Title County Commissioners End Site Title top navigation nav bar row Menu nav snippet County Commissioners BCC Home BCC Staff BCC Meeting Agendas Currently selected Briefs Find Your District Districts District 1 Biography City Watch News Archive Newsletter Videos District 2 District 2 Alerts Biography City Watch Videos News Archive Newsletter test District 3 Biography City Watch Videos News Archive Newsletter Boletín Informativo District 4 Newsletter Videos Biography City Watch News Archive District 5 Biography Videos News Archive Newsletter District 6 Biography Cities/Municipalities News Archive Newsletters Meeting Request Videos District 7 Biography City Watch News Archive Newsletter Videos High School Scholarships Database County Administrator BCC Meeting Videos BCC Meeting Dates end nav snippet /nav /navbar-inner /#topnavbar /col-12 nav bar row header page title BCC Meeting Agendas /tablet 12 col /row /container /end masthead page layout Page Content Page Content ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ Zone 1 Zone 2 Zone 3 Gallery sidebar with a block grid. Note: block grid items should be the same size for optimal results Zone 4 The following is for the order of business at the next meeting of the Board of County Commissioners. This and any backup materials attached thereto are for informational purposes only and are subject to additions, deletions, or revisio​​​ns at any time, up to and during the meeting, without notice to the public. ​BCC Meeting Agenda​s August 26, 2025 Agenda August 19, 2025 Agenda ​ July 22, 2025 Agenda July 8, 2025 Agenda BCC Workshop Schedule BCC Workshop Schedule ​​ BCC Meeting/Workshop Dates BCC Regular & Workshop Meetings Agenda Item Submittal Schedule BCC Rules of Procedure Rules of Procedure (Revised April 8, 2025) ​ Public Notice Meetings Calendar For more information, call the Agenda Coordinator at 561-355-3229 . The meetings are held in the Palm Beach County Robert Weisman Governmental Center, 6th floor Commission Chambers, 301 N. Olive Avenue, West Palm Beach. Public Comment Public Comment Alternative for BCC Regular and Workshop Meetings and Matters by the Public ONLY​​ IMPORTANT: If you plan to speak in person at a meeting, PLEASE DO NOT use this form. You must fill out a comment card when you arrive. Members of the public can submit comments on agenda items for BCC Regular and Workshop meetings and Matters by the Public ONLY through the following form: Submit Public Comment . In order for public comments to be filed in the official record with the Clerk's office for the referenced meeting, the form must reference the agenda item number and the meeting date and MUST be submitted as follows: Prior to the start of the particular agenda item on the particular meeting date or for Matters by the Public, before the 2:00 p.m. time certain on the particular public hearing date. PLEASE NOTE : For Board of County Commissioners Comprehensive Plan or Zoning Public Hearings managed by the Planning and Zoning Divisions, respectively, and posted on the web pages below, public comments may be submitted at the hearing or to the project manager listed in the particular public notice on this page . Comments received prior to the hearing date will be submitted into the record at the hearing. BCC Planning Agendas and Minutes BCC Zoning Agendas and Minutes For anyone needing ADA accommodations to attend the meeting or to submit public comments, please e-mail pbcaccessibility@pbc.gov or contact Public Affairs at 561-355-2754 . ​​ BCC Meeting Agendas July 9, 2024 Agenda July 2, 2024 Agenda June 18, 2024 Agenda BCC Rules of Procedure Rules of Procedure ‭(Hidden)‬ BCC Rules of Procedure Rules of Procedure ‭(Hidden)‬ League of Cities/BCC Joint Meeting Agenda February 24, 2020 Age​nda ​ ‭(Hidden)‬ Meeting Agendas (August 26, 2025 Agenda) (August 19, 2025 Agenda) (July 22, 2025 Agenda) ‭(Hidden)‬ PZB - Planning Division BCC Planning Agendas and Minutes ‭(Hidden)‬ PZB – Zoning Division BCC Zoning Agendas ​ BCC Meeting Archives BCC Briefs BCC Meeting Videos BCC Meeting Agendas (PDF Format) BCC Meeting Agendas (HTML Format) Agenda Summaries/Minutes - Clerk & Comptroller

BCC Meeting/Workshop Dates

  • 2024 BCC Regular & Workshop Meeting Dates
  • 2024 Agenda Item Submittal Schedule
  • Public Notice Meeting Calendar
Note : Users of iPhones and some mobile devices may need to download a PDF reader application. The Board of County Commissioners meetings are broadcast live on TV Channel 20 and rebroadcast on the evening of the meeting, beginning at 6 p.m. If the meeting continues beyond 6 p.m., the rebroadcast is presented on Channel 20 the following day, beginning at 9 a.m. Page Content 1 Page Content 1 Zone 5 BCC Directory BCC Home BCC Staff BCC Agendas BCC Briefs E-mail BCC Find Your District Zoning Commission Hearings & Meetings District 1 - Maria G. Palm Beach County Administrator
Joseph Abruzzo is the County Administrator of Palm Beach County, where he oversees more than 7,100 positions and manages a $9 billion budget serving 1.6 million residents. He is dedicated to transparency in government, creating a positive workplace culture, and improving efficiency so residents experience the highest quality of service.
​
»​​
